actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service..

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of an annuity to any Federal employee who completes 20 years of service, based on 2 1/2 percent of his average pay multiplied by the years of his total service, or 2 percent of his average pay plus $25 multiplied by his years of service, whichever is the larger amount. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336, 8339)

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement, and for other purposes.
